Direct/Close Coupled.description: Motor shaft and fan shaft connected without intermediary coupling, ensuring highly efficient power transfer.

Belt Driven.description: Motor and fan connected by belts and pulleys, allowing speed adjustments and easier maintenance access.

Motor.DE: Highest priority (typically experiences the most load and stress)

Independent Bearing.DE: Third priority (transfers the majority of power and experiences the highest dynamic forces)
Independent Bearing.NDE: Fourth priority (after the drive-end bearing is monitored)

Justification for Ranking.Load Transfer & Stress Concentration: Prioritize components bearing the greatest load and largest horsepower.
Justification for Ranking.Cost-Effectiveness: Focus on critical bearings first for impactful data.
Justification for Ranking.Broad Applicability: Applicable to any rotating machinery with bearings.

Threaded Stud Mount (Drill & Tap).requirements: Mounting surface must be at least ½" thick

High-Strength Magnet.reason: Can shift or 'walk' over time, causing inaccurate readings.
